title: Basically, don't f*** with the Chinese

embed.description: Hunter Hu said he was in his shop at 5pm on Thursday when a man came in Hu claims he passed him a note that read: 'I have a knife, give me money' Footage shows Hu going to the kitchen before returning with two cleavers Alleged thief turns on his tail and flees, running across six lanes of traffic An alleged knife-wielding robber was thwarted by a noodle shop owner who chased him away with two meat cleavers.

replies.body: Lol that girl at the counter. Comedy.

> you have one knife i have two!

what a legend
That's not a knife, THIS IS A KNIFE!
